full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE GSHEGS GTOR ZHES BYAS PA BZHUGS S+HO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MI PHYED PA'I DAD GUS LDAN PA DGE TSUL BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS ZHES BGYI BAS PHYAG RDOR GYI BSKANG GSO RGYUN DU 'DON PA'I PHYIR, DUS BZANG DU GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, ,BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA YI BDAG PO SOGS 'GRO KUN LA PHAN PA RGYA CHEN PO 'BYUNG GYUR CIG , ,,)
